response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth, which I believe could greatly enhance your collection or business. Given its exceptional nature, I propose a special introductory price of $1,200,000 for you to consider.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further in understanding the value proposition of this product. I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
